name: Watching Friends
description:
Do you like Friends? It's a wonderful tv series that you can watch over and over again. 
In this little game you can refresh your memory and learn about a few funny episodes. Maybe you will want to watch them after playing! 

Controls: arrow keys or WASD

Graphics are all hand-drawn and painted. Programming and music by me as well. :) 

Made for the Flatjam 2018.

Desktop versions for Windows and Mac coming soon! :)
